short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simplifies the Facebook home page, allowing for a more intentional and focused Facebook browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simplifies the Facebook home page, allowing for a more intentional and focused Facebook browsing experience. Please note that it may not always work due to changes in Facebook's algorithms, and occasionally, a page refresh may be necessary to reapply the settings.
